column4: An undetermined error happened on the Server.
Could not connect to Zookeeper at given address. Check that zookeeper is running and accessible by the rest server.
The request doesn't correspond to the structure needed to solve your request. Please review the body of your request.
A value is missing from your request or is misplaced.
One of your parameter doesn't have the expected format and cannot be parsed.
Cannot remove root path from zookeeper.
Cannot remove a node with existing childs (Use 'recursive' option).
All authentication headers were detected as empty.
Error while trying to authenticate user using Authorization header.
No error happened but user is empty.
Authentication header didn't contain any user.
